esp-rx-pin.help: ESP8266 module Tx pin, Mc Rx PB_7 or PA_10

esp-tx-pin.help: ESP8266 module Rx pin, Mc Tx PB_6 or PA_9

mqtt-broker-hostname.help: MQTT Broker resolvable hostname, for IBM Cloud. <org-id>.messaging.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com

mqtt-client-id.help: MQTT client name, for IBM Cloud. d:<org-id>:<device-type>:<device-id>

mqtt-auth-token.help: Authentication Token for the Device ID

mqtt-topic.help: MQTT topic to publish. IBM cloud topic must be like iot-2/evt/<user-defined-event-name>/fmt/<json|txt|xml|csv>. More info at https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSQP8H/iot/platform/devices/mqtt.html
